infotexts.entityname.berra_etps7b: BerraARM ETPS-7B Extreme Temperature Protective Suit
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_etps7b: Heavy protective suit produced by Berra Armory. Designed for Extreme environments. \n Using high quality material to protect user from burning. \nOwns a CCR and a self cooling system, can protect user in extreme temperature and low oxygen envirnments.
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_bio2: NBC EXOsuit produced by Berra Armory,advanced self-sealing material can provide secure air tightness in combat. \nA part of Berra TAC Combat NBC Gear.
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_cbrn3: A ballistic gas mask made by Berra Armory,can combine with filiter to filter toxic substances in the cost of field of view. \nA part of Berra TAC Combat NBC Gear.
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_cbrn3a: A comprehensive respirator produced by Berra Armory,can filter toxic substances or using oxygen tanks to breath in low oxygen locations. \nBetter material,better FOV. \nA part of Berra TAC Combat NBC Gear.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_filiter: Standard gas mask filter issued by T.S.M \nShould be used with a gas mask
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_filiter: Standard gas mask filter produced by Berra Armory,better material,more durable \nShould be used with a gas mask
infotexts.entityname.berra_drl3_inc: BerraARM DRL-3 84mm Disposable Rocket Launcher \nIncendiary Warhead
infotexts.entityname.berra_drl3_fab: BerraARM DRL-3 84mm Disposable Rocket Launcher \nFuel-Air Warhead
infotexts.entityname.berra_drl3_heat: BerraARM DRL-3 84mm Disposable Rocket Launcher \nHEAT Warhead
infotexts.entityname.berra_drl3_dumb: BerraARM DRL-3 84mm Disposable Rocket Launcher \nTraining Warhead
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_TES20: A 20mm modular weapon system produced by Berra Armory,designed based on XM25 \nCan use multiple ammunition.
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_obj227flamethrow: A heavy flame thrower produced by Berra Armory,use oxidant-fuel unit \nBorn for burning,the best choice to make a barbecue
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_obj227aflamethro: A by-product during the development stage of Obj.227,closer range due to a lack of pressurized tank,but easier to use
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_drl3_inc: Disposable Rocket Launcher, come with a incendiary warhead \nClear back blast area before launch \nBackblast range:3.6m
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_drl3_fab: Disposable Rocket Launcher, come with a fuel-air warhead \nClear back blast area before launch \nBackblast range:3.6m
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_drl3_heat:
Disposable Rocket Launcher, come with a HEAT warhead 
Clear back blast area before launch 
Penetration:~2500mm 
Backblastrange:3.6m
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_drl3_dumb:
Disposable Rocket Launcher, come with a Training warhead 
Clear back blast area before launch 
Hey,this is just a training weapon,DO NOT FIGHT YOUR ENEMY WITH THIS! 
Backblast range:3.6m
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_m4_beowulf:
A M4 but fires 12.7×45 rounds
FULL AUTO 
High recoil and expensiveness prevent it from large scale use 
WAIT...WHAT?
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_m4_458socom: A M4 but fires .458 SOCOM rounds \nFULL AUTO \nLess recoil compare to 12.7×45,a better design allow it come with a built-in suppressor
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_m110: High quality DMR produced by Berra Armory \nFires 7.62×51 NATO \nPerfect accuracy and low recoil,the best choice for marksmen
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_m3e1maaws: A M3E1 recoilless rifle \nLaunch all compatible ammunition \nDid someone said 'rifle'?
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_mk153: A Shoulder-launched Multipurpose Assault Weapon produced by Berra Armory\nLaunch all compatible ammunition
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_m2hb: A long barrel M2HB \nUses .50BMG M9 belts\nUUwUU
infotexts.entitydescription.sacabambaspis_he:
A REGULAR offensive grenade,double tap E and throw it. 
 DONT BLOW YOURSELF UP 
Can easily blow up almost everything(including yourself) but doors 
Smaller effective range, greater lethality
infotexts.entitydescription.tes20mag_arr: 20mm Flechette used by "Punisher", EXTREMELY effective in close range
infotexts.entitydescription.tes20mag_he: 20mm programable high-explosive used by "Punisher" \nLet's blow something up \nWARNING:CURRENTLY NOT PROGRAMABLE
infotexts.entitydescription.tes20mag_ll: 20mm Rubber Less Lethal shot used by "Punisher",IT HURTS...
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_STANAG_50beowulf: STANAG Magazine \nContaining 7 12.7×45 Fragile rounds \nPoor penetration but extreme stopping power
STANAG Magazine \nContaining 7 12.7×45 AP rounds \nPerfect penetration and (relatively)high stopping power
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_STANAG_458socom: STANAG Magazine \nContaining 10 .458 SOCOM rounds \nGood stopping power and penetration,less expensive than 12.7×45
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_STANAG_458socom_: STANAG Magazine \nContaining 20 .458 SOCOM rounds \nGood stopping power and penetration,less expensive than 12.7×45
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_STANAG_50beowulf: STANAG Magazine \nContaining 15 12.7×45 Fragile rounds \nPoor penetration but extreme stopping power

STANAG Magazine 
Containing 15 12.7×45 AP rounds 
Perfect penetration and (relatively)high stopping power! 
Let's kick some ass
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_300FAL_M118LR: FAL Magazine \nContaining 25 7.62×51NATO M118LR rounds \nHigh-accuracy ammunition,designed for DMRs
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_50bmg_belt_fmjt:
.50BMG belt 
M33 FMJ 
500 rounds MAX 
STOP WORRING ABOUT AMMUNITION,JUST SHOOT!!!!
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_mk153_dumb: Mk153 SMAW Training rounds,the same trajectory with standard MK153 rounds \nSERIOUSLY,DO NOT FIGHT YOUR ENEMY WITH THIS \nBackblast range:4.4m
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_mk153_inc: Mk153 SMAW Incendiary rounds,much more heavier=much more fuel \nBARBECUE TIME \nBackblast range:4.4m
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_mk153_heat:
Mk153 SMAW HEDP rounds 
Most common ammunition,good at both killing and penetration 
Penetration:~2500mm 
Backblast range:4.4m
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_mk153_theat:
Mk153 SMAW Tandem HEAT 
Heavier,slower 
Heavy ammunition designed to make holes 
Penetration:~5000mm 
Backblast range:4.4m
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_mk153_bdm:
Mk153 SMAW Bunker Buaster 
Heavier,slower 
Old design to destory "bunkers" on the earth,now it was revived on Europa 
NOW GO TO HELL WITH YOUR RIDICULOUS "COVER" 
Backblast range:4.4m
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_mk153_he: Mk153 SMAW HE-Frag \nDesigned for killing,enough fragments and explosives to kill living things within range. \nBackblast range:4.4m
infotexts.entitydescription.vx_chemdist_40: A 40mm grenade designed to spread chemicals \nFilled VX Agent
infotexts.entitydescription.mustard_chemdist_40: A 40mm grenade designed to spread chemicals \nFilled Mustard Agent
infotexts.entitydescription.phosgene_chemdist_40: A 40mm grenade designed to spread chemicals \nFilled Phosgene Agent
infotexts.entitydescription.cs_chemdist_40: A 40mm grenade designed to spread chemicals \nFilled CS Agent
infotexts.entitydescription.bz_chemdist_40: A 40mm grenade designed to spread chemicals \nFilled BZ Agent
infotexts.entitydescription.anthrax_biodist_40: A 40mm grenade designed to spread contained with explosives \nFilled Anthrax
infotexts.entitydescription.mustard_biodist_40: A 40mm grenade designed to spread contained with explosives \nFilled Mustard Agent
infotexts.entitydescription.vx_biodist_40: A 40mm grenade designed to spread contained with explosives \nFilled VX Agent
infotexts.entitydescription.vx_chemdist_throwable: A grenade designed to spread chemicals \nFilled VX Agent \nFuse 0.5s
infotexts.entitydescription.mustard_chemdist_throw: A grenade designed to spread chemicals \nFilled Mustard Agent \nFuse 0.5s
infotexts.entitydescription.phosgene_chemdist_thro: A grenade designed to spread chemicals \nFilled Phosgene Agent \nFuse 0.5s
infotexts.entitydescription.cs_chemdist_throwable: A grenade designed to spread chemicals \nFilled CS Agent \nFuse 0.3s
infotexts.entitydescription.bz_chemdist_throwable: A grenade designed to spread chemicals \nFilled BZ Agent \nFuse 0.3s
infotexts.entitydescription.fsm_throwable: A grenade filled with special chemicals.Can instantly fill the room with CO2 gas \nFuse 1.5s \nWARNING:PLEASE EQUIP BREATHING EQUIPMENTS WHILE USING
infotexts.entitydescription.canister: Sealed Container made with steel and hardened glass \nCan stand small impacts and stray bullets \nIt is not recommend damaging it
infotexts.entitydescription.vxcanister:
Sealed Container made with steel and hardened glass
Filled with VX Agent 
Can stand small impacts and stray bullets 
It is not recommend damaging it
infotexts.entitydescription.cscanister:
Sealed Container made with steel and hardened glass
Filled with CS Agent 
Can stand small impacts and stray bullets 
It is not recommend damaging it
infotexts.entitydescription.bzcanister:
Sealed Container made with steel and hardened glass
Filled with BZ Agent 
Can stand small impacts and stray bullets 
It is not recommend damaging it
infotexts.entitydescription.mustardcanister:
Sealed Container made with steel and hardened glass
Filled with Mustard Agent 
Can stand small impacts and stray bullets 
It is not recommend damaging it
infotexts.entitydescription.phosgenecanister:
Sealed Container made with steel and hardened glass
Filled with Phosgene Agent 
Can stand small impacts and stray bullets 
It is not recommend damaging it
infotexts.entitydescription.anthraxcanister: Sealed Container made with steel and hardened glass\nFilled with Anthrax\nCan stand small impacts and stray bullets
infotexts.entitydescription.chemdist_40: A 40mm grenade designed to spread chemicals
infotexts.entitydescription.biodist_40: A 40mm grenade designed to spread contained with explosives
infotexts.entitydescription.chemdist_throwable: A grenade designed to spread chemicals
infotexts.entityname.col_cac2: Coalition SCAC-2 Standard Chemical agent Countermeasure №2
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_obj121: Multipurpose biological countermeasure,can treat bioinfection effectively
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_d6: Comprehensive first-aid measure issued by T.S.M \nEffective against NBC threats
infotexts.entitydescription.col_cac2: Coalition issued chemical countermeasure for all coalition soliders \nCheap but useful
infotexts.entitydescription.pe_cure: Pulmonary Edema Treatment,only treats Pulmonary Edema :) \nThis item is for Neurotrauma
infotexts.entitydescription.powdercapsule_anthrax: Sealed tube contains white chemical \nYou may try if it's "The Medicine"
infotexts.entitydescription.powdercapsule_vx: Sealed tube contains white chemical \nYou may try if it's "The Medicine"
infotexts.entitydescription.powdercapsule_med: Sealed tube contains white chemical \nYou may try if it's "The Medicine"
infotexts.entitydescription.nuke_10k: A fully functional 10kt TNT equivalent nuclear warhead.All you need to do is to detonate it \Now I am become death.The destoryer of worlds
infotexts.entitydescription.nuke_100k: A fully functional 100kt TNT equivalent nuclear warhead \nThis is not a toy.Treat it with caution
infotexts.entitydescription.nuke_1000k: A fully functional 1000kt TNT equivalent nuclear warhead \nEuropa trembles beneath your feet.
infotexts.entitydescription.nuke_5000k: A fully functional 5000kt TNT equivalent fusion warhead \nBURN!EUROPA!
infotexts.entitydescription.neutron_warhead: A fully functional neutron warhead \nIrregular nuclear weapon,uses radiation to kill every living things \nCovers are jokes with this.
infotexts.entitydescription.emp_warhead: Heavy EMP warhead, can shutdown everything electronic within range. \nWhat was your mission in Shanghai? :)
infotexts.entitydescription.omega_warhead: A special warhead manufactured on the earth with non-replicable technology \nThe onlything able to disable everything within range. \nThis the very last resort.Good Luck.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.the_medicine: This body was enhanced by the medicine
infotexts.entityname.univ_backblast_exc: Backblast generator \nHow can you see this?
infotexts.entityname.univ_heat_self: Metal jet \nHow can you see this?
infotexts.entitydescription.c4_stickcharge: The most common C4 plastic charge in sapper units,come with special glue,can easily stick to anything it touchs \nEach cell contains 2KG explosive.Theoretically it can blow up even the thickest barrier.
infotexts.entitydescription.m57detonator: The most common detonator in sapper units, can detonate 2 explosives with electronic fuse. \nField tutorial:RMB+LMB at the start of each round,no less or more than 2 explosives at a time or malfunction. After setting enough charges,RMB+LMB to detonate
infotexts.missiondescription.berra_fireeaters_outp: "Fire Eater" found a bio leak in this outpost.Destory everything here
infotexts.missionmessage0.berra_fireeaters_outpost: Death is a cool summer night, providing a good sleep
infotexts.missiondescription.berra_fireeaters_assi: "Fire Eater" found a bio leak in this outpost.They won't leave with the samples
infotexts.missionmessage0.berra_fireeaters_assinat: Until all bodies were burnt in flames, dust crawls up and down with the wind, landing in everyone's eyes
infotexts.missiondescription.berra_undermasks_outp: CBRN Emergency Response Team found a chemical weapon leak in this location.Nothing should left here. \nWARNING:CLEARING THE AREA MAY LEAD TO COMPLETE DESTRUCTION ON THE OUTPOST.
infotexts.missionfailure.berra_undermasks_outpostd: People struggled breathing in chemicals for oxygen, without awaring they are not breathing in air.
infotexts.missionmessage0.berra_undermasks_outpost: This is what we built to kill others.
infotexts.missiondescription.berra_undermasks_assi: CBRN Emergency Response Team found a chemical weapon leak in this location.None shall leave with the samples. \nWARNING:CLEARING THE AREA MAY LEAD TO COMPLETE DESTRUCTION ON THE OUTPOST.
infotexts.missionmessage0.berra_undermasks_assinat: Step into the outpost is the start of a war and a countdown to death.

Override.entitydescription.tsm_helmet_respirator: Heavy helmet produced by T.S.M,has great ballistic performence and a gas mask.
Override.entitydescription.tsm_medicalkits_s: Advanced medical kit produced by T.S.M,contains enough medical equipments for a field surgery.Also contains medicals against NBC threats. \nExpensive but worthy.
Override.entitydescription.nuclearshell: A explosive device designed to launch from a Railgun.Usually was used to throw tons of radioactive material onto enemies.
Override.entitydescription.nuclearshellcheap: A explosive device designed to launch from a Railgun.Usually was used to throw tons of radioactive material onto enemies.

infotexts.loadingscreentip: Five years ago, I lost 30,000 men in a blink of an eye. And the Europa just F***IN Watched.\n——Lerentine
Normally you cant just put carbon,sulfur and phosphorus into a tiny machine and cook these chemical agents. \n——NotAlwaysTrue，Berra Group CEO
infotexts.jobdescription.cbrn_guy: A Security Officer who took basic CBRN training. He can build weapons with his knowledge after further training.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyiinfection_weapo: Infected with weaponzied Evil Virus, conversion in progress. \nWARNING: patient is infectious
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeath.eyiinfection_weap: Becoming another victim of bio weapons
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.eyiinfection_: You have become another victim of bio weapons, but politicians they don't care.
infotexts.entitydescription.weyicanister:
Sealed Container made with steel and hardened glass
Filled with Weaponized Evil Virus 
Can stand small impacts and stray bullets 
Note: This weaponized virus was modified specifically for human, have ability to infect and convert human into monsters, can spread through aerosol
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_de_handgun_fa: A fullauto modification on a large caliber pistol. This modified version cannot unleash the full power of. 50AE, meanwhile bold recoil made controlling it a difficult. Small capacity and massive spread shows it only effective in close range. \nUse ‖color:150,0,0,255‖.50 AE‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_m82a1: A .50BMG auto Anti-Material Rifle, high cost in return of impressvie accuracy and power
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_m107a1: A .50BMG auto Anti-Material Rifle, cost less, has a shorter barrel.
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_m107a1_fa: A .50BMG auto Anti-Material Rifle. High Power, Full AUTO \nBlend your enemies
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_M107Mag_mk211mod: M107 Standard 10 round magazine, can adapt to M82A1 AMR \nMk211 Mod0 HEIAP \nPossible llegal issue when using against human, if you really care
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_M107Mag_m33: M107 Standard 10 round magazine, can adapt to M82A1 AMR \nM33 FMJ \nThe cheapest and most common .50BMG ammo
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_M107Mag_m903: M107 Standard 10 round magazine, can adapt to M82A1 AMR \nM903 SLAP \nRare experimental ammunition
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_M107Mag_m1022: M107 Standard 10 round magazine, can adapt to M82A1 AMR \nM1022 \nHigh precision ammunition
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_cbrnert:
Heavy combat CBRN suti designed and produced by T.S.M. Everyting is perfect but weight and mobility. 
Using hard materials and high toughness self sealing chemical fillers, it can effectively resist projectiles and protect users in chemical environments. Crush depth: 8000m 
Main equipment of T.S.M CBRN Emergcy Response Team 
You are the last line against threats.
infotexts.entitydescription.standard_cbrnsuit_gray: A CBRN Suit that meets the standards of the Coalition. May not provide good protection, but it is better than nothing
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_mk153_illuminati: Mk153 Low Speed Illumination \nLet there be ligh! The god said. \nBackblast:4.4m
infotexts.entitydescription.berra_mk153_flechette:
Mk153 SMAW Flechette 
Use 10 steel bars instead of explosive warhead, fight your enemies with KE 
No need to care blowing your friendlies up 
Backblast:4.4m
infotexts.entitydescription.weyi_chemdist_40: A 40mm grenade using aerosol to spread bio-weapons \nFilled with Evil Virus
infotexts.entitydescription.m57detonator_single: The most common detonator in sapper units, can detonate 1 explosives with electronic fuse. \nField tutorial:RMB+LMB at the start of each round,no less or more than 1 explosives at a time or malfunction. After setting enough charges,RMB+LMB to detonate
infotexts.entitydescription.m57detonator_triple: The most common detonator in sapper units, can detonate 3 explosives with electronic fuse. \nField tutorial:RMB+LMB at the start of each round,no less or more than 3 explosives at a time or malfunction. After setting enough charges,RMB+LMB to detonate
infotexts.entitydescription.weyi_chemdist_throwabl: A grenade using aerosol to spread bio-weapons \nFilled Evil Virus \nFuse: 1.5s
infotexts.entitydescription.sacabambaspis_he_impac:
A offensive grenade with impact fuse 
WARNING: May cause unexpected detonation or misfire if not properly used 
Can easily blow up almost everything(including yourself, doors and your enemies) 
Smaller effective range, greater lethality
infotexts.afflictiondescription.dutyofcbrn: This is my duty, fight til end
infotexts.talentdescription.rangedspreadreduction: Your spread of Rangedweapons will reduce[amount]%
infotexts.talentdescription.aimbetter: Your spread of Rangedweapons will reduce [amount]% when aiming
infotexts.talentdescription.dutyofcbrn: When you are attacked, acquire [affliction2] \nYou will not fall unconscious for [time] seconds when health below 0
infotexts.talentdescription.nanomachine: Plant nanomachine in your body,providing [amount]% resist fro poison
infotexts.talentdescription.nanomachineondamaged: When your health below [amount]%, heal yourself using nanomachine \nNanomachine will last [time] seconds after reaching [amount]% health
infotexts.entitydescription.eyi_weaponizedcanister:
使用高硬度玻璃和钢制造的密封容器 
内部使用特殊药剂保存了武器化的恶疫病毒 
可以承受小强度撞击和子弹打击 
说明:此武器化病毒为特别为人类修改,有能力感染并转化人类,通过气溶胶传播 
经过特殊调制的基因组序列将有效地自我复制并转化宿主原有细胞
infotexts.entitydescription.standard_cbrnsuit_oran: 一套符合联盟标准的核生化防护服,不能提供什么良好的防护,但是总比什么防护都没有强 \n能提供足够的接触保护
infotexts.talentdescription.maxtriggerinseconds: 此效果在[seconds]秒内只能触发1次
